modal.title: Allow Geolocation
modal.description: We would like to use your location to show you the nearest gas stations. Do you allow us to access your location?

tutorial.searchInput: Search Input (you can search a street)
tutorial.fuelDropdown: Fuel dropdown (you can filter by your favourite fuel)
tutorial.brandDropdown: Brand dropdown (you can choose your favourite brand)
tutorial.rangeSelector: Range selector (you can select the range from your position for found gas stations)
tutorial.servicedOrNot: Serviced or Not (If you want serviced or self)
tutorial.searchButton: Search button (From this moment you have all the gas station with the filters)
tutorial.positionButton: Position button (Every time you click this button, only if you have allowed to geolocation, you return in your live position)

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We are a team of dedicated professionals committed to providing the best services.
